answers.answer: Yes me! I failed my 1 hr with a 156 and I passed my 3 hr!
I barely failed my 1hr and had to do the 3hr, passed with flying colors
That's good to hear I've been so nervous! Im 19 it's my first baby and I'm trying to do everything right! Can't wait to meet my little one in 8 weeks!
I did now I'M in the hospital for a couple of days
